attributes.action: Call a referendum on Irish Unity in order to save Brexit
attributes.additional_details: The majority of English people have never been to Northern Ireland, it costs the English Tax payer £9 billion every year, most English citizens have no interest or connection to Northern Ireland, we should give up Northern Ireland for the sake of Britain
attributes.background: Brexit will never happen due to the Irish Backstop. Britain should call a referendum on Irish Unity, allowing the people or Northern Ireland & Ireland to vote for Irish Unity, freeing Britain to pursue Brexit and gain our freedom from the EU.
